attributes.action: Hold a state funeral for Tony Benn
attributes.additional_details:
British politican Tony Benn should be afforded a state funeral in recognition of his services to British politics and the high esteem in which he was held.

While considered divisive by many he was a much-loved figure and a staunch defender of human rights, and being divisive does not necessarily preclude one from being the recipient of a state funeral.

R.I.P., Tony Benn

rejection.details: One for the Queen to decide, as well as Mr Benn's family.
